name: ULocalPlayerSaveGame
doc:
Abstract subclass of USaveGame that provides utility functions that let you associate a Save Game object with a specific local player.
These objects can also be loaded using the functions on GameplayStatics, but you would need to call functions like InitializeSaveGame manually.
For simple games, it is fine to blueprint this class directly and add parameters and override functions in blueprint,
but for complicated games you will want to subclass this in native code and set up proper versioning.

methods.name: AsyncSaveGameToSlotForLocalPlayer
methods.doc:
Asynchronously save to the slot and user index.
This will return true if the save was requested, and errors should be handled by the HandlePostSave function after the save succeeds or fails

methods.name: GetInvalidDataVersion
methods.doc: Returns the invalid save data version, which means it has never been saved/loaded

methods.name: GetLatestDataVersion
methods.doc: Returns the latest save data version, this is used when the new data is saved

methods.name: GetLocalPlayerController
methods.doc: Returns the local player controller this is associated with, this will be valid if it is ready to save

methods.name: GetPlatformUserId
methods.doc: Returns the platform user to save to, based on Local Player by default

methods.name: GetPlatformUserIndex
methods.doc: Returns the user index to save to, based on Local Player by default

methods.name: GetSavedDataVersion
methods.doc: Returns the game-specific version number this was last saved/loaded as

methods.name: GetSaveSlotName
methods.doc: Returns the save slot name to use

methods.name: IsSaveInProgress
methods.doc: Returns true if a save is in progress

methods.name: OnPostLoad
methods.doc: Blueprint event called after loading, is not called for newly created saves

methods.name: OnPostSave
methods.doc: Blueprint event called after saving finishes with success/failure result

methods.name: OnPreSave
methods.doc: Blueprint event called before saving, do any game-specific fixup here

methods.name: OnResetToDefault
methods.doc: Blueprint event called to reset all saved data to default, called when the load fails or manually

methods.name: ResetToDefault
methods.doc: Resets all saved data to default values, called when the load fails or manually

methods.name: SaveGameToSlotForLocalPlayer
methods.doc:
Synchronously save using the slot and user index, stalling the main thread until it completes.
This will return true if the save was requested, and errors should be handled by the HandlePostSave function that will be called immediately.

methods.name: WasLastSaveSuccessful
methods.doc: Returns true if it has been saved at least once and the last save was successful

methods.name: WasLoaded
methods.doc: Returns true if this was loaded from an existing save

methods.name: WasSaveRequested
methods.doc: Returns true if a save was ever requested, may still be in progress
